name: 危険スマホ - RiskyPhone
description:
Let 's aim for high score of smartphone while "Walking Smartphone".
If you are too absorbed in the smartphone, you will hit a person or a car.
You will miss the train if you are too careful.(Depart at 12 o'clock)

In Japanese

歩きスマホをしながらスマホゲームの高得点を目指しましょう。
スマホゲームに夢中になりすぎると、人や車にぶつかります。
慎重になりすぎると電車に乗り遅れます。(12時発車)

歩きスマホは最高ですね。

IMPORTANT CONTROLS

Z,X,C key = Anser for game in smartphone

W,S key = acceleration/ deceleration

A.D key = move left/right

1 key = start game

T key = restart game.

you can also use xbox controller. please check readme.txt.

Music：魔王魂(http://maoudamashii.jokersound...)
